intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do when it rains?
Where do you go to school?
What is your favorite type of food?

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to buy this shirt?
respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. You see a shirt you like.

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to order a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to eat?

ask_situations.instruction: At the store, ask the shopkeeper about the price of a shirt.
You want to ask your parent for a new toy. ..
At school, ask your friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I read books in the evening. I like stories and pictures. Reading is fun. It helps me relax. I read for thirty minutes.

monologue.topic: Talk about your uncle or aunt

follow_up_questions.question: Do you like to visit your aunt?
